text: Karin Dor (Kätherose Derr; 22 February 1938 – 6 November 2017) was a German actress. She was born in Wiesbaden, Germany. She starred in the James Bond movie You Only Live Twice and the Alfred Hitchcock movie Topaz.2008 interview (German) Dor died at a nursing home in Munich, Germany on 6 November 2017 at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actresses who played Bond girls Category:Actors who played Bond villains Category:Entertainers from Hesse Category:German movie actors Category:German stage actors Category:German television actors Category:People from Wiesbaden
title: Karin Dor
